root: ^This is all so bizarre, isn't it?
^I'm glad. You don't have to relive your murder over and over again.
^Heh. "Relive." That's a funny word. At any rate, I think thinsg will be okay from here.
^I might not remember anything that happened that day I was murdered but thankyou for all your help.
^If I was going to die... I'm glad I won't anymore.
^I'm glad, too. Just keep an eye on Jake.
^I don't think they'll be able to arrest him, but I'll at least get him banned from here.
^So if he comes back we can actually arrest him. Not for murder, but for tresspassing. Still good enough.
^Yeah, how do you feel about being murdered by your friend.
^Very odd. Especially since I don't remember any of it.
^But I'm alive now, and I wish to stay that way.
^You know, you should come back again sometime. When there's a little less murder.
^I'll give you a lifeling free pass.
^No problem. The carnival should be a fun place for everyone.
^I regret that it was anything less than that for you.
